steps.title: Welcome, Commander
steps.text:
Your job here is to keep the battle front alive.

The soldiers will fight on their own, but you control the supplies.

steps.title: The Map
steps.text:
This is the battle map. On the left you can see your headquarters (HQ), your forward operating bases (FOBs), and your battle fronts. In blue you'll see the entire area your team controls.

On the other side you can see your opponent playing symmetrically

steps.title: The Battle Front
steps.text: This is your battle front. Battle front nodes will move automatically based on available supplies

steps.title: Front without Resources
steps.text: The bar shows the node's supplies. When the front runs out of resources, it will automatically retreat. Your mission is to prevent this by maintaining an active supply chain.

steps.title: Territory Control
steps.text: Territory control affects gold income. For every inch of ground your soldiers advance, you gain riches. Additionally, you earn a small amount passively. This money will be used for the store.

steps.title: Supply Bar
steps.text: As we saw, this bar indicates your battle front's supplies. To get new supplies to it, pay attention to the following tips.

steps.title: HQ Heavy Trucks
steps.text: The HQ has heavy supply trucks at your disposal. It's not safe or efficient to send them directly to the combat front. You should send them by clicking on the forward operating bases (FOBs).

steps.title: FOB Light Trucks
steps.text: From the FOBs you can send light trucks by clicking, which will travel to the front, deliver the supplies, and return.

steps.title: FOB Indicators
steps.text: Keep in mind that FOBs have supply and vehicle availability indicators. Trucks are useless without supplies, and you can't send help no matter how many supplies you have if your trucks haven't returned.

steps.title: The Store
steps.text: Here you can deploy the store by clicking.

steps.title: Store Contents
steps.text: Inside you'll find a whole series of buildings and logistical resources to help your front advance. Some will give you passive rewards, others will strengthen your supply chains, others will hinder enemy development... You can review what they do in the Arsenal, from the main menu.

steps.title: Game Objective
steps.text: Your objective is to push the enemy border back to their HQ to win the match.

steps.title: Front Clash
steps.text: When both fronts meet, the one with more supplies will automatically push the other.

steps.title: Into Battle!
steps.text: If you want, you can jump straight into battle with the default team or create your own team from the Arsenal. Good luck!
